1550761507_1E6XbnEgJMBkFbxsd7i7yZWvMaQgg.body:
> [linkvslink26](#comment_1_1E6XbnEgJMBkFbxsd7i7yZWvMaQggchH1C): what can it be used for just the in built stuff like this?

From what I can tell it's anything that one could do on the Clearnet, with the added benefit of Tor (and maybe in the future, i2p) anonymity. Social media, news, video over WebTorrent, file share, etc.

Not trying to insult you or anything, but the reason that you're asking is because you take for granted the freedom of access and use of similar systems on the Clearnet that others may be killed or blackbagged (disappeared) for using.
